reviewText: Just so you know there are 2 parts to the Half Slave Half Free title. The part 1 is Solomon Northup and part 2 is Charlotte Forten's Mission, so those 2 titles are the complete Half Slave Half Free title. Hope that this clears up any confusion.

I really enjoyed Part 1 of Solomon Northrup's Odyssey. I made a mistake and ordered on part I. I also ordered Part I of Charlotte Fortens Mission which I really enjoyed. I would like to have part II of both movies. If you can locate part II of both movies please contact me.
